feed.title: Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Gull Island Rapids (Trans-Labrador Hwy)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:53 AM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Sunny. Temperature falling to minus 40 this morning then rising.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 40 this morning then rising. Wind chill minus 56 this morning and minus 42 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 42 this evening and minus 52 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Friday 24 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Sunny. High minus 27.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind west 20 km/h. High minus 27. Wind chill minus 52 in the morning and minus 36 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Friday 24 February 2023
